main event: A couple reported seeing a stationary, bright round light outside their bedroom window at 2:00 a.m. on June 27, 1964, in Swansea, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The light was described as the size of a basketball and hovered about 6-8 feet off the ground,The object was very bright and almost blinding,The couple observed the light for about 20 minutes before it shot straight up into the sky without sound,They had never mentioned the sighting out of fear of being considered crazy,There was a bright moon present at the time of the sighting.
witness description: a couple who saw the light outside their bedroom window
